>Construction of pLYC14
acquire oligo ZH11			
acquire oligo ZH11R
acquire oligo ZH5
acquire oligo ZH5R
acquire oligo ZH12
acquire oligo ZH12R
acquire plasmid pLYC10
acquire genomic_dna MG1655_dxs
PCR ZH11,ZH5R on pLYC10	(3372 bp, pcrA14)
PCR ZH5,ZH12R on pLYC10	(4953 bp, pcrB14)
PCR ZH12,ZH11R on MG1655_dxs (1941 bp, pcrC)14
Assemble pcrA14,pcrB14,pcrC14	(Gibson, pLYC14)
Transform pLYC14	(Mach1, Amp)
